description: Variation of Conditions 1 and 5 of planning permission dated 26 October 2023 (23/05248/FULL) for use of the flat roof as a terrace including the installation of a metal balustrade, timber decking, planters and seating to accommodate a mechanical ventilation and heat recovery (MVHR) unit.  Raising the height of the parapet wall (adjacent No.38 Buckingham Gate); NAMELY, inclusion of railing at the rear of the terrace for fall prevention and amendment to the location of MVHR unit, and omission of the MVHR screening.
